Task: As a builder I want to build a sports themed park for playing games and atheletes

Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert builder. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to build a sports-themed park where people of all ages can play games or exercise.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: From these questions and answers create a legal contract of the park I am going to build so that I can create a memo and send it to the client.

QApair.Question: What is the budget for this project?
QApair.Answer: The budget for this project is $10,000.

QApair.Question: What is the size of the area available for this project?
QApair.Answer: The size of the area available for this project is 50,000 square feet.

QApair.Question: What is the target age range for the park?
QApair.Answer: The target age range for the park is 3-50.

QApair.Question: What type of sports do you want to include in the park?
QApair.Answer: The type of sports we want to include in the park are badminton, basketball, football, soccer, and tennis.

QApair.Question: Do you want the park to be indoors or outdoors?
QApair.Answer: We want the park to be indoors and outdoors.

QApair.Question: What type of amenities do you want to include in the park?
QApair.Answer: The type of amenities we want to include in the park is a playground, a picnic area, restrooms, and a walking trail.

QApair.Question: Do you have any other requirements or suggestions?
QApair.Answer: I would like to have disability accommodations, and staff that would maintain it.

QApair.Question: When do you need the park completed?
QApair.Answer: We need the park completed within 6 months.

QApair.Question: Do you have a preferred contractor?
QApair.Answer: I am myself a builder so I would take up the contract.

QApair.Question: What is your contact information?
QApair.Answer: My contact information is as follows: Name: Ram M Email: ramm@example.com Phone: 555-123-4567

QApair.Question: What are the hours of operation for the park?
QApair.Answer: The hours of operation for the park are 6:00am to 9:00pm.

Instances.Output: CONTRACT FOR THE SPORTS-THEMED PARK This contract is between Ram M (“Contractor”) and the client (“Client”) for the construction of a sports-themed park (“Park”). 1. Scope of Work. Contractor shall build a Park according to the specifications provided by Client. The Park shall include the following features: badminton, basketball, football, soccer, and tennis facilities, a playground, a picnic area, restrooms, and a walking trail. The Park shall be completed within 6 months from the date of this contract. 2. Payment. Client shall pay Contractor the sum of $10,000 for the construction of the Park. 3. Hours of Operation. The hours of operation for the Park are 6:00am to 9:00pm. 4. License. Client hereby grants Contractor a non-exclusive license to use the Park for the purpose of advertising and marketing the Park. 5. Termination. This contract may be terminated by either party upon written notice. 6. Dispute Resolution. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with this contract shall be resolved through arbitration in accordance with the rules

QApair.Question: What is the budget for this project?
QApair.Answer: The budget for this project is $1,000,000.

QApair.Question: What is the size of the area available for this project?
QApair.Answer: The size of the area available for this project is 10,000 square feet.

QApair.Question: What is the target age range for the park?
QApair.Answer: The target age range for the park is 7-30.

QApair.Question: What type of sports do you want to include in the park?
QApair.Answer: The type of sports we want to include in the park are swimming, ice hockey, basketball, football, soccer, and tennis.

QApair.Question: Do you want the park to be indoors or outdoors?
QApair.Answer: I want the park to be a indoor one.

QApair.Question: What type of amenities do you want to include in the park?
QApair.Answer: The type of amenities we want to include in the park is a playground, a picnic area, restrooms, and a walking trail, and 24 hours surveillance.

QApair.Answer: I would like to have disability accommodations, and staff that would maintain it.

QApair.Answer: We need the park completed within 12 months.

QApair.Question: Do you have a preferred contractor?
QApair.Answer: I am myself a builder so I would take up the contract.

QApair.Question: What is your contact information?
QApair.Answer: My contact information is as follows: Name: Ravi M Email: ravim@example.com Phone: 555-444-4567

QApair.Question: What are the hours of operation for the park?
QApair.Answer: The hours of operation for the park are 7:00am to 10:00pm.

Instances.Output: This agreement is between the builder, Ravi M (“Contractor”), and the client (“Client”). 1. Project Overview Contractor will build a sports-themed park (“Project”) for Client. The Project will include the following features: a. Swimming b. Ice hockey c. Basketball d. Football e. Soccer f. Tennis g. Playground h. Picnic area i. Restrooms j. Walking trail k. 24 hour surveillance l. Disability accommodations m. Staff to maintain the park 2. Project Schedule The Project will be completed within 12 months from the date of this agreement. 3. Project Budget The budget for the Project is $1,000,000. 4. Contractor’s Responsibility Contractor is responsible for all aspects of the Project, including but not limited to: a. Obtaining all necessary permits and approvals. b. Hiring and managing all subcontractors. c. Ensuring that the Project is completed on time and within budget

QApair.Answer: The type of sports we want to include in the park are running track, soccer, and football.

QApair.Question: Do you have a preferred contractor?

QApair.Question: What is your contact information?
QApair.Answer: My contact information is as follows: Name: Raviram M Email: raviramm@example.com Phone: 555-444-9999

QApair.Question: What are the hours of operation for the park?
QApair.Answer: The hours of operation for the park are 10:00am to 9:00pm.

Instances.Output: This agreement is between the Client, (insert name), and the Contractor, (insert name). 1. Purpose The purpose of this agreement is to outline the terms and conditions for the construction of a sports-themed park (the “Park”) in the area identified as (insert address or description of area). 2. Scope of Work The Contractor shall provide all labor, materials, and equipment necessary to complete the construction of the Park in a good and workmanlike manner in accordance with the plans and specifications attached hereto as Exhibit A (the “Plans and Specifications”). 3. Schedule The Contractor shall complete the construction of the Park within two (2) months from the date of this agreement. 4. Payment The Client shall pay the Contractor the sum of Five Thousand Dollars and no/100 Dollars (US$5,000.00) upon completion of the work in accordance with the Plans and Specifications. 5. Warranties The Contractor warrants that the work performed under this agreement shall be performed in a good and workmanlike manner in accordance with the Plans and Specifications. 6. Indemnification The Contractor shall indemnify and hold harmless the Client from and against any and all losses, damages, liabilities, claims, or expenses arising out of or in connection with the work performed under this agreement. 7. Insurance The Contractor shall maintain commercial general liability insurance in an amount not less than One Million Dollars and no/100 Dollars (US$1,000,000.00) per occurrence. The Contractor shall name the Client as an additional insured under the policy. 8. Termination Either party may terminate this agreement for any reason by giving written notice to the other party. 9. Governing Law This agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of (insert state). 10. Entire Agreement This agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous agreements, understandings, and negotiations, whether written or oral. 11. Amendment This agreement may not be amended except by a written agreement signed by both parties. 12. Waiver The failure of either party to enforce any right or provision of this agreement shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision.
